AzureBlade: Right... I've played with you long enough...

In midair, he cut=
 the main thrusters, switches to robot mode, and
dives, sword first, toward=
s Animus.

AzureBlade: Fear me... I am no Decepticon, no Autobot. I am the =
One
who was crafted, forged, cast and assembled, the One who Slays. I am
he=
re to tell you, Minions, that you are not safe anymore. I am
Protoform Z!

=
He was submerged by the energy flare. It engulfed him, but he
continued. He=
 was still whole, still deadly, and the spots where his
armor had been worn=
 were even already beginning to grow back. He was
still thrusting with his =
sword, ready to spear Animus on it. His grin
could have sent shivers down t=
he circuits of even Ironhide...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclo=
nus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> 
> --- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> 
=
> > Azureblade: Laughable. How could you guys have held for so long?
> > 
>=
 > He transformed again, this time into a cybertronian jetfighter, His
> > =
speed increasing to be almost unbearable. If the rockets could follow
> > t=
hat...
> > 
> > He swerved, facing once again the minions, and let loose a =
volley of
> > his own missiles as well as a few shots of his cannon.
> 
> O=
OC: The minion and Animus are not quite together. Animus is close to
> the =
ground, the minion is much higher up. 
> 
> Azureblade is able to outrun th=
e rockets of the minion. The rockets
> eventually loose power and fall away=
, leaving the Decepticon some
> distance away. 
> 
> "This is foolishness."=
 He shook his head in derision. "You run from
> battle even as you call us =
weak?" Gripping his sword in both hands he
> stands his ground as the full =
brunt of the firepower converges on him
> and detonates explosively. When t=
he light and smoke clears there is
> another crater, but in the middle of i=
t Animus still stands, apparently
> protected by some shield of power. "Fac=
e me Decepticon!" His voice
> carries over the distance. "Your antics are t=
iresome!" With a
> deliberate motion he directs his sword at Azureblade he =
fires a blast
> of power at him!
> 
> Preston
> (Animus)
